Header: Political agreement inked with the New Democratic Front
Content: A new Political Agreement was signed in Colombo today pledging support to New Democratic Front Presidential candidate Sajith Premadasa. The Memorandum of Understanding was inked by the United National Front, political parties and civil organizations as well as former President Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunge. Former President Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunge and the United National Front signed a Memorandum of Understanding in Colombo today with the United National Front. It was with respect to the forthcoming Presidential election.Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe, new Democratic Front Presidential candidate Sajith Premadasa and many party leaders joined in the occasion. Sajith Premadasa said that the aim of this exercise was to develop and bring prosperity to the country and give priority to Buddhism and safeguard other religions and communities. They are prepared to establish a respectable administration. The journey is centred on social democracy. It is an occasion in which justice will be meted out to every community. The supreme law will be enforced to all equally. He assured protect the human rights of everyone. Sajith Premadasa said that everyone is linked to a carrying forward the country towards development.
